javadoc: Creates a component for editing Dates using a formated textfield and a Jspinner.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a DateSpinner object using the given spinnerModel and a pattern for a formated text field.

params.name: pattern
params.comment: a pattern to be used by a JFormattedTextField

methods.javadoc:
Returns the spinner component.
@return the spinner component.
methods.name: getSpinner

methods.javadoc:
Returns the DateTextField component.
@return the DateTextField component.
methods.name: getDateField

methods.javadoc:
Sets the Date value for this DateSpinner.
@param newValue the new Date for this DateSpinner.
methods.name: setValue
methods.comment: Sets the Date value for this DateSpinner.

params.name: newValue
params.comment: the new Date for this DateSpinner.

methods.name: addChangeListener
methods.comment:
Adds a ChangeListener to the model's listener list.  The
 ChangeListeners must be notified when the models value changes.

methods.name: removeChangeListener
methods.comment: Removes a ChangeListener from the model's listener list.

methods.name: fireStateChanged

name: DateSpinner
comment: Creates a component for editing Dates using a formated textfield and a Jspinner.
